author: Ira Rosenzweig
comment: Like "tasker for  the Dumbbells ". Simple. Beautiful graphics.
title: Amazing

author: Tim Cane
comment: This app let's me issue gestures from my watch! A Simple to use interface with premium watch faces! Well worth considering the pro version!!
title: There is nothing else quite like this!

author: Ben Tutt
comment: Deceptively simple app which lets you quickly access all your different functions, really easy to understand and useful straight away. Great
title: Brilliant
